ygData.subject: Re: Darkwood Failure
ygData.msgSnippet: Oops, In my last post, I used an Oak bow in my example... I meant to use an Elm (oak has a lot higher critical hit base value)... sorry about that :( Also,
ygData.messageBody:
Oops,

In my last post, I used an Oak bow in my example...

I meant to use an Elm (oak has a lot higher critical hit base value)...
sorry about that :(

Also, your skill in archery and your strength (mostly archery) play an
important role in your critical hits. I've been told (not proven) that for
every five skill levels of archery increase you CH base by 1pt. Thus,
having a higher skill and better bow with those class 8 arrows can yield
critical hits as high as 130 PTS (I've actually seen these hits from other
characters) or more!

So fletch away!...


"Kyrros" Ranger of the ninth blessing of Tunare; protector of the fauna of
Queynos, the Karanas, and Surefall Glade.
(Bristlebane)
